statements: SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE invoice_id = 100
SELECT invoice_number, total_amount FROM invoices WHERE customer_id = 500 ORDER BY invoice_date DESC
SELECT invoice_number, total_amount, invoice_date FROM invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount ASC, invoice_date DESC
SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE invoice_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND total_amount < 500
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_date, total_amount FROM invoices WHERE customer_id = 200 ORDER BY invoice_date ASC
SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT invoice_number, total_amount FROM invoices WHERE due_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 AND customer_id = 101 ORDER BY invoice_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS invoice_count FROM invoices GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT invoice_number, total_amount FROM invoices WHERE invoice_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Invoices;
SELECT invoice_id, customer_name, amount FROM Invoices WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, invoice_date FROM Invoices ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, invoice_id, amount_paid, payment_date FROM Payments ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, amount FROM Invoices WHERE invoice_date >= '2022-01-01' AND invoice_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Invoices WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY invoice_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT invoice_id, customer_name FROM Invoices WHERE invoice_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT payment_id, invoice_id, amount_paid FROM Payments JOIN Invoices ON Payments.invoice_id = Invoices.invoice_id WHERE Payments.payment_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY Payments.payment_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, amount FROM Invoices WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT invoice_id, customer_name, invoice_date FROM Invoices WHERE invoice_date >= '2021-01-01' AND invoice_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY customer_name ASC, invoice_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM invoices;
SELECT invoice_number, amount, created_at FROM invoices ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT payment_number, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT invoice_number, amount FROM invoices WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT invoice_number, amount FROM invoices WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC;

SELECT customers.name, invoices.amount, payments.amount FROM customers JOIN invoices ON customers.id = invoices.customer_id JOIN payments ON payments.invoice_id = invoices.id WHERE customers.email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT customers.name, SUM(invoices.amount) AS total_amount FROM customers JOIN invoices ON customers.id = invoices.customer_id GROUP BY customers.name ORDER BY total_amount DESC;

SELECT customers.name, COUNT(payments.id) AS total_payments FROM customers LEFT JOIN invoices ON customers.id = invoices.customer_id LEFT JOIN payments ON invoices.id = payments.invoice_id WHERE payments.payment_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY customers.name HAVING total_payments > 2 ORDER BY total_payments DESC;
SELECT * FROM Invoices;
SELECT invoice_id, customer_name FROM Invoices ORDER BY invoice_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM Invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM Invoices WHERE invoice_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Invoices ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM Invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Products WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT i.invoice_id, p.product_name, ip.quantity FROM Invoice_Products ip JOIN Invoices i ON ip.invoice_id = i.invoice_id JOIN Products p ON ip.product_id = p.product_id WHERE ip.quantity > 5;
SELECT i.invoice_id, SUM(ip.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Invoice_Products ip JOIN Invoices i ON ip.invoice_id = i.invoice_id GROUP BY i.invoice_id HAVING total_quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM Invoices ORDER BY invoice_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT invoice_number, total_amount FROM Invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, contact_email, billing_address FROM Customers WHERE billing_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity_ordered) AS total_quantity FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY invoice_date DESC
SELECT invoice_number, total_amount FROM Invoices WHERE customer_id = 3 AND invoice_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'

SELECT Customers.customer_name, Invoices.invoice_date, Products.product_name FROM Customers INNER JOIN Invoices ON Customers.customer_id = Invoices.customer_id INNER JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id INNER JOIN Products ON Orders.product_id = Products.product_id WHERE Customers.customer_id = 1
SELECT invoice_number, SUM(amount_paid) AS total_payments FROM Invoices LEFT JOIN Payments ON Invoices.invoice_id = Payments.invoice_id GROUP BY invoice_number

SELECT Customers.customer_name, Orders.order_date, Products.product_name, Products.price FROM Customers INNER JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id INNER JOIN Products ON Orders.product_id = Products.product_id WHERE Orders.quantity_ordered > 2 ORDER BY Customers.customer_name ASC
